typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesADLS
MoviesADLS select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(year)>=1951) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(genres = iif(locate('|', genres)>1, left(genres, locate('|', genres)-1 ), genres)) ~> PrimaryGenre
